attributes.action: We call upon the Government to instruct the Metroplilitan Police to arrest  Anjem Choudary for incitement to hatred and supporting terrorists
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned demand the arrest of Anjem Choudary for incitement to hatred and support for terrorists.  Choudary has for many years has incited Muslim hatred of the values of democracy and the way of life of this country and he has also supported terrorists.

rejection.details: This is a police operational matter
